channel.title: I need a Skillcape system:
channel.description:
Do you guys know how to add skillmasters to the game like on the real runescape? I am devlopping a 317 delta server (A runescape 2006 remake) I need devloppers btw: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600325.0.html
I made this allready:
[code]1,talk with the npc ("NPC SAYS:Congratulations! You are a master of Hitpoints. Im glad to give you this Cape.") 2,first he gives non trimmed, so we do something like hasCape = 0 into the char files. then if they get a cape for the first time it changes to hasCape = 1 3,after they got hasCape = 1 they allways get trimmed capes instead of normal ones,
NPC ID'S: 1,Agility master- Cap'n Izzy No-Beard - ID: 437 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4317 Normal: 2704 Hood: 2706 2,constitution master - Surgeon General Tafini - ID: 961 COORDS:3378-3276 CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4341 Normal: 2701 Hood: 2703 3,cooking master - Head Chef - ID: 847 COORDS: 3143-3449 CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4325 Normal: 2731 Hood: 2733 4,Crafting master - master crafter - ID: 805 COORDS: 2936-3287 CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4327 Normal: 2713 Hood: 2715 5,Fishing master - Master fisher - ID: 308 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4335 Normal: 2728 Hood: 2730 6,Fletching master - Hickton - ID: 575 COORDS: 2823-3442 CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4337 Normal: 2716 Hood: 2718 7,mage master - Robe store owner - ID: 1658 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4343 Normal: 2692 Hood: 8,Mining master - Dwarf - ID: COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4345 Normal: 2722 Hood: 2724 9,prayer master - Brother jered - ID: 802 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4347 Normal: 2689 Hood: 2691 10, ranging master - Armour Salesman - ID: 682 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4351 Normal: 2686 Hood: 2688 11,Runecrafting master - aubury - ID: 553 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4333 Normal: 2698 Hood: 2700 12,slayer master - duradel - ID: 1599 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4355 Normal: 2719 Hood: 2721 13,smithing master - thurgo - ID: 604 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4357 Normal: 2725 Hood: 2727 14,thieving master - martin thwait - ID: 2270 COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: 4361 Normal: 2710 Hood: 2712 15, quest master - wise old man - ID:2566-2567 idk wich one COORDS: CAPE AND HOOD ID'S: Trimmed: Normal: QuestCape normal and trimmed + hood isnt added yet. Hood:4. Some thieving stalls arent working + the Guards at Ardougne dont work for thieving.[code]
I just need someone to help me with adding them to an npc that says the first 3 lines i whrote above here.[/code]

item.title: I need a Skillcape system:
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

All you did was gather the configuration details. That’s as simple as Googling it. Making dialogues is very, very simple and if you can’t even do that, just quit now and learn how to actually program with Java.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a Skillcape system:
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

ohokay the dude will post here :
" dialouge not working "
1000 errors…
what the code mean??

things like that. He cant do it on his own.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a Skillcape system:
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I just stared at this line

I just need someone to help me with adding them to an npc that says the first 3 lines i whrote above here.
I just need someone to help me with adding them to an npc that says the first 3 lines i [size=20pt]whrote[/size] above here.

Anyways…

You need to look into first click npc and add the case for the npc there.

In the case you could include something like…

if (playerLevel[#] == 99) {
dialogue("Congratulations, you are a master in #. \nHere's your skillcape");
//give cape or open shop
} else {
dialogue("You are not level 99 in this skill yet!");
}

Read full topic

item.title: I need a Skillcape system:
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

I really did not catch the question.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a Skillcape system:
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

Do you guys know how to add skillmasters to the game like on the real runescape?
I am devlopping a 317 delta server (A runescape 2006 remake)
I need devloppers btw: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600325.0.html

I made this allready:

[code]1,talk with the npc (“NPC SAYS:Congratulations! You are a master of Hitpoints. Im glad to give you this Cape.”)
2,first he gives non trimmed, so we do something like hasCape = 0 into the char files. then if they get a cape for the
first time it changes to hasCape = 1
3,after they got hasCape = 1 they allways get trimmed capes instead of normal ones,

NPC ID’S:
